description: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera..

title: Hung fan kui
description: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

title: The Indian in the Cupboard
description: Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cabinet from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother and a tiny plastic model of an Indian from his best friend Patrick.

title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
description: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

title: Apollo 13
description: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

title: Babe
description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

title: Bad Boys
description: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

title: Batman Forever
description: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

title: Before Sunrise
description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

title: Billy Madison
description: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

title: Braveheart
language: English, French, Latin, Scottish Gaelic, Italian
description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

title: The Bridges of Madison County
description: Photographer Robert Kincaid (Clint Eastwood) wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson (Meryl Streep), for four days in the 1960s.

title: Casino
description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.

title: Casper
description: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

title: La cité des enfants perdus
description: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

title: Boys on the Side
description: Robin shares a ride in her car from NYC to LA with Jane. They stop at Jane's friend's place in Pittsburg and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The 3 very different women become close friends.

title: Clueless
description: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

title: Clockers
description: Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.

title: Heat
description: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: Hackers
description: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

title: GoldenEye
description: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as Goldeneye is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

title: Friday
description: Two homies, Smokey and Craig, smoke a dope dealer's weed and try to figure a way to get the $200 they owe to the dealer by 10 p.m. that same night.

title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
description: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

title: Home for the Holidays
description: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

title: Dead Man Walking
description: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

title: Dead Man
description: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange Native American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

title: Dangerous Minds
description: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.

title: Copycat
description: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

title: Desperado
description: A gunslinger's embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

title: Marvin's Room
description: After 20 years caring for her father, woman with cancer now must re-connect with her trashy sister and nephews she's never met after being diagnosed. Her love helps the angry teen nephew, and her sister learns to relate to people.

title: Romeo + Juliet
description: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

title: The Rock
description: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

title: Ransom
description: Multimillionaire, Tom Mullen's beloved son is kidnapped. He cooperates at first, but then turns the tables on the kidnappers and decides to take matters into his own hands.

title: Pusher
description: A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.

title: Primal Fear
description: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

title: The Nutty Professor
description: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
description: The story of a controversial pornography publisher and how he became a defender of free speech.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

title: Michael Collins
description: Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary

title: Matilda
description: Story of a wonderful little girl, who happens to be a genius, and her wonderful teacher vs. the worst parents ever and the worst school principal imaginable.

title: Scream
description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

title: Phenomenon
description: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

title: Secrets & Lies
description: A successful black woman discovers that her birth mother is an underprivileged white woman, but the woman denies it. As emotions run high, everyone's secrets are exposed.

title: Mars Attacks!
description: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

title: Sleepers
description: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, they get their chance for revenge.

title: Sling Blade
description: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

title: Space Jam
description: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

title: Star Trek: First Contact
description: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

title: Stealing Beauty
description: After her mother commits suicide, a young woman travels to Italy in search of love, truth and a deeper connection with herself.

title: Swingers
description: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.

title: Bordello of Blood
description: The Crypt Keeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello.

title: Sydney
description: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

title: That Thing You Do!
description: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from its manager.

title: A Time to Kill
description: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

title: Tin Cup
description: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.

title: Trainspotting
description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: Twister
description: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

title: Shine
description: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

title: Lone Star
description: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

title: Bottle Rocket
description: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

title: Bound
description: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

title: Jingle All the Way
description: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

title: 101 Dalmatians
description: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

title: The Arrival
description: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
description: The dim-witted teen duo of Beavis and Butt-Head travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

title: The Birdcage
description: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

title: Bulletproof
description: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

title: The Cable Guy
description: A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

title: Courage Under Fire
description: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

title: Crash
description: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

title: Ed
description: A trained chimpanzee plays third base for a minor-league baseball team.

title: Escape from L.A.
description: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

title: Evita
description: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

title: Executive Decision
description: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

title: The English Patient
description: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

title: Fargo
description: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Jerry Maguire
description: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

title: James and the Giant Peach
description: An orphan, who lives with his two cruel aunts, befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

title: Jack
description: Because of an unusual aging disorder that has aged him four times faster than a normal human being, a boy enters the fifth grade for the first time with the appearance of a 40 year old man.

title: The Fan
description: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
description: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: Hellraiser: Bloodline
description: In the 22nd century, a scientist attempts to right the wrong his ancestor created: the puzzle box that opens the gates of Hell and unleashes Pinhead and his Cenobite legions.

title: Independence Day
description: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

title: From Dusk Till Dawn
description: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

title: The Frighteners
description: After a tragic car accident that kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

title: Flirting with Disaster
description: A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.

title: The First Wives Club
description: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

title: Happy Gilmore
description: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

title: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
description: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

title: A Life Less Ordinary
description: Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.

title: Mononoke-hime
description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Mimic
description: Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.

title: Men in Black
description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

title: Lolita
description: A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.

title: Liar Liar
description: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

title: Lost Highway
description: After a bizarre encounter at a party, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic and begins leading a new life.

title: Kundun
description: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

title: Kiss the Girls
description: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

title: Jackie Brown
description: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

title: The Jackal
description: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
description: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

title: Hercules
description: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: Gummo
description: Lonely residents of a tornado-stricken Ohio town wander the deserted landscape trying to fulfill their boring, nihilistic lives.

title: Mousehunt
description: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

title: L.A. Confidential
description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen -- one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy -- investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
description: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

title: As Good as It Gets
description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: Cube
description: 6 complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

title: Volcano
description: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles, threatening to destroy the city.

title: Vegas Vacation
description: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

title: U Turn
description: A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong does go wrong.

title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
description: The legendary Power Rangers must stop the evil space pirate Divatox from releasing the powerful Maligore from his volcanic imprisonment on the island of Muranthias, where only the kindly ...

title: Wag the Dog
description: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

title: Grosse Pointe Blank
description: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Night Flier
description: A reporter is on the trail of a vampiric murderer who travels by plane.

title: Starship Troopers
description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

title: Spawn
description: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

title: Soul Food
description: One person can keep a family together and, when that one person is gone, a family can be torn apart.

title: Seven Years in Tibet
description: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

title: Selena
description: The true story of Selena Quintanilla-Perez, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.

title: Scream 2
description: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

title: The Saint
description: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

title: The Relic
description: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

title: The Postman
description: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
description: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Fire Down Below
description: Going undercover in rural Kentucky, an environmental agent tries to prove the dumping of toxic waste in the local coal mines by ruthless industrialists.

title: George of the Jungle
description: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

title: Conspiracy Theory
description: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

title: Con Air
description: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

title: Chun gwong cha sit
description: A couple take a trip to Argentina but both men find their lives drifting apart in opposite directions.

title: Chasing Amy
description: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

title: Good Burger
description: Two dim-witted teenagers are forced to save the fast food restaurant they work at from going out of business, despite a new-and-improved burger joint opening across the street that want to be the "Top Dog" in the fast food industry.

title: Boogie Nights
description: The story of a young man's adventures in the California pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

title: Bean
description: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.

title: Contact
description: Dr. Ellie Arroway (Jodie Foster), after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

title: Batman & Robin
description: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

title: Anastasia
description: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Anaconda
description: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

title: Amistad
description: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

title: Alien Resurrection
description: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

title: Air Force One
description: Communist Radicals hijack Air Force One with The U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a Veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

title: Absolute Power
description: Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).

title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
description: A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
description: A 1960s secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

title: Dante's Peak
description: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

title: La vita è bella
description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

title: Deconstructing Harry
description: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

title: The Game
description: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

title: Fools Rush In
description: After a one night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.

title: Flubber
description: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

title: Gattaca
description: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

title: Orgazmo
description: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

title: The Fifth Element
description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

title: The Full Monty
description: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

title: Face/Off
description: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

title: Donnie Brasco
description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

title: The Devil's Own
description: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

title: The Devil's Advocate
description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

title: Event Horizon
description: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

title: G.I. Jane
description: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

title: Wild Things
description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

title: The X Files
description: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

title: What Dreams May Come
description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

title: Lethal Weapon 4
description: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

title: The Wedding Singer
description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

title: Senseless
description: A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.

title: A Night at the Roxbury
description: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

title: He Got Game
description: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

title: Out of Sight
description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

title: The Prince of Egypt
description: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: The Thin Red Line
description: Adaptation of

title: A Perfect Murder
description: A wealthy Wall Street speculator discovers that his wife has a lover. He investigates him and uses the carrot and stick to make him murder his wife. Planned to detail, it seems like a perfect murder.

title: Star Trek: Insurrection
description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

title: Pleasantville
description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

title: Practical Magic
description: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Rush Hour
description: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

title: Six Days Seven Nights
description: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

title: U.S. Marshals
description: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

title: Simon Birch
description: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

title: Gekijô-ban poketto monsutâ - Myûtsû no gyakushû
description: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

title: Elizabeth
description: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

title: The Negotiator
description: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: Waking Ned
description: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

title: Jing Ke ci Qin Wang
